none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 22, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
Utterly guttural Southern grind. Forceful, massive, chaotic, relentless....and fukk is it fast. Choice cut is "Infinite Regret" if only for the (slightly) slower kinda '90s sounding guitar part that creeps in just before the robotic lurch/squeal/mini mosh, but each of those parts whizz by in just a couple of seconds. This 2013 release from North Carolina's BRAINxTOILET requires maximum attention, and maximum volume comes highly recommended.  BRAINxTOILET
https://brainxtoilet.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: BRAINXTOILET - BRAINXTOILET demo 2013 - Terminal Escape
